{"id":610392609,"lang":"java","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1640960960,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/610392609/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Arranging Coins","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int arrangeCoins(int n) {\n        if(n==0 || n==1){\n            return n;\n        }\n        int s = 1;\n        int e = 79000;\n        int ans = -1;\n        while(s<=e){\n            int mid =  s + (e-s)/2;\n            if(((mid)*(mid+1)) == n){\n                return mid;\n            }\n            else if((((mid)*(mid+1))/2) < n){\n                ans = mid;\n                s = mid+1;\n            }\n            else{\n                e = mid-1;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"arranging-coins"}
